sqlMap.select:
/* WHPutaway.searchWHPutawayItemList */ SELECT T.*, CIW.FIX_LOC_CD, dbo.TL_GET_WH_LOC_NM (T.WH_CD, CIW.FIX_LOC_CD) AS FIX_LOC_NM, CASE WHEN CI.PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD = T.PKGUNIT THEN CI.PKG_LV1_PUT_TP_CD WHEN CI.ITEM_PKGUNIT = T.PKGUNIT THEN CI.PKG_LV2_PUT_TP_CD WHEN CI.PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD = T.PKGUNIT THEN CI.PKG_LV3_PUT_TP_CD WHEN CI.PKG_LV4_UNIT_CD = T.PKGUNIT THEN CI.PKG_LV4_PUT_TP_CD END PUT_TP_CD, CIL.LOT_ATTRIB_01 AS INBOUND_DT, ISNULL (CIL.LOT_ATTRIB_02, ' ') AS LOT_NO, T.EA_QTY - T.PUT_SUM_EA_QTY AS NON_PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, ISNULL(CI.PKG_LV1_QTY, 0) AS PKG_LV1_QTY, ISNULL(CI.LV1_CBM, 0) AS LV1_CBM, ISNULL(CI.LV1_CBF, 0) AS LV1_CBF, ISNULL(CI.LV1_GRS_KGS, 0) AS LV1_GRS_KGS, ISNULL(CI.LV1_GRS_LBS, 0) AS LV1_GRS_LBS, ISNULL(CI.LV1_NET_KGS, 0) AS LV1_NET_KGS, ISNULL(CI.LV1_NET_LBS, 0) AS LV1_NET_LBS FROM (SELECT RI.WIB_IN_NO, RI.WIB_BK_NO, RI.PO_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SEQ, PI.PUTAWAY_SEQ, RI.ITEM_CD, RI.ITEM_NM, RI.LOT_ID, RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD, R.WH_CD, dbo.TL_GET_LOC_NM(R.WH_CD) AS WH_NM, W.CTRT_NO, dbo.TL_GET_CTRT_NM (W.CTRT_NO) AS CTRT_NM, RI.INBOUND_LOC_CD, dbo.TL_GET_WH_LOC_NM (W.WH_CD, RI.INBOUND_LOC_CD) AS INBOUND_LOC_NM, ISNULL (PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD, RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD) AS RCV_SND_DMG_CD, ISNULL (CASE PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD WHEN 'S' THEN 'Sound' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Damage' END, RI.RECEIVED_TYPE) AS RCV_SND_DMG_NM, RI.PKGUNIT, ISNULL (RI.PKGQTY, 0) AS PKGQTY, ISNULL (RI.EA_QTY, 0) AS EA_QTY, PI.PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD, dbo.TL_GET_WH_LOC_NM (W.WH_CD, PI.PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD) AS PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_NM, dbo.TL_GET_WH_LOC_PROP_NM (W.WH_CD, PI.PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD) AS PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_PROP_NM, PI.PUTAWAY_PKGUNIT, ISNULL (PI.PUTAWAY_PKGQTY, 0) AS PUTAWAY_PKGQTY, ISNULL (PI.PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, 0) AS PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, ISNULL (PI.PUTAWAY_CBM, 0) AS PUTAWAY_CBM, ISNULL (PI.PUTAWAY_CBF, 0) AS PUTAWAY_CBF, ISNULL (PI.PUTAWAY_GRS_KGS, 0) AS PUTAWAY_GRS_KGS, ISNULL (PI.PUTAWAY_GRS_LBS, 0) AS PUTAWAY_GRS_LBS, ISNULL (PI.PUTAWAY_NET_KGS, 0) AS PUTAWAY_NET_KGS, ISNULL (PI.PUTAWAY_NET_LBS, 0) AS PUTAWAY_NET_LBS, SUM(ISNULL(PI.PUTAWAY_EA_QTY,0)) OVER ( PARTITION BY RI.WIB_IN_NO, RI.WIB_BK_NO, RI.PO_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SYS_NO, RI.ITEM_SEQ, ISNULL (PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD, RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD)) AS PUT_SUM_EA_QTY, PI.INV_CHG_FLG, PI.PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD AS OLD_PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD, ISNULL (PI.PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, 0) AS OLD_PUTAWAY_EA_QTY, 1 AS ADD_ROW, CASE ISNULL (RI.WIB_IN_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE 'N' END AS DEL_ROW, CASE ISNULL (PI.WIB_IN_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN 'NEW' ELSE 'UPDATE' END AS EDIT_FLAG, (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TL_WH_INV_LOT II WHERE RI.WIB_BK_NO = II.WIB_BK_NO AND RI.PO_SYS_NO = II.PO_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SYS_NO = II.ITEM_SYS_NO AND RI.LOT_ID = II.LOT_ID AND II.ALLC_QTY > 0) AS OB_CNT, ISNULL ((SELECT SUM (ISNULL (IL.IN_QTY, 0)) FROM TL_WH_INV_LOC IL WHERE PI.WIB_BK_NO = IL.WIB_BK_NO AND PI.PO_SYS_NO = IL.PO_SYS_NO AND PI.ITEM_SYS_NO = IL.ITEM_SYS_NO AND RI.LOT_ID = IL.LOT_ID AND PI.PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD = IL.WH_LOC_CD), 0) AS OLD_INV_QTY FROM TL_WH_RCV R, (SELECT WIB_IN_NO, WIB_BK_NO, PO_SYS_NO, ITEM_SYS_NO, ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CD, ITEM_NM, LOT_ID, INBOUND_LOC_CD, CASE l WHEN 1 THEN 'S' ELSE CASE l WHEN 2 THEN 'D' END END AS RECEIVED_TYPE_CD, CASE l WHEN 1 THEN 'Sound' ELSE CASE l WHEN 2 THEN 'Damage' END END AS RECEIVED_TYPE, CASE l WHEN 1 THEN SND_PKGUNIT ELSE CASE l WHEN 2 THEN DMG_PKGUNIT END END AS PKGUNIT, CASE l WHEN 1 THEN SND_PKGQTY ELSE CASE l WHEN 2 THEN DMG_PKGQTY END END AS PKGQTY, CASE l WHEN 1 THEN SND_EA_QTY ELSE CASE l WHEN 2 THEN DMG_EA_QTY END END AS EA_QTY FROM (SELECT * FROM TL_WH_RCV_ITEM WHERE 1 = 1
AND WIB_IN_NO = #c_wib_in_no#
AND WIB_BK_NO = #c_wib_bk_no#
) AS TEMP, (SELECT 1 AS l UNION SELECT 2 ) AS l ) RI LEFT JOIN TL_WH_PUTAWAY_ITEM PI ON RI.WIB_IN_NO = PI.WIB_IN_NO AND RI.WIB_BK_NO = PI.WIB_BK_NO AND RI.PO_SYS_NO = PI.PO_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SYS_NO = PI.ITEM_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SEQ = PI.ITEM_SEQ AND RI.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD = PI.RCV_SND_DMG_CD, TL_WH_IB W, TL_WH_IB_ITEM WI
WHERE 1 = 1
AND R.WIB_IN_NO = #c_wib_in_no#
AND R.WIB_BK_NO = #c_wib_bk_no#
AND RI.EA_QTY > 0 AND R.WIB_IN_NO = RI.WIB_IN_NO AND R.WIB_BK_NO = W.WIB_BK_NO AND W.WIB_BK_NO = WI.WIB_BK_NO AND RI.WIB_BK_NO = WI.WIB_BK_NO AND RI.PO_SYS_NO = WI.PO_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SYS_NO = WI.ITEM_SYS_NO AND RI.ITEM_SEQ = WI.ITEM_SEQ) T LEFT JOIN TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_WH CIW ON T.CTRT_NO = CIW.CTRT_NO AND T.ITEM_SYS_NO = CIW.ITEM_SYS_NO AND T.WH_CD = CIW.WH_CD LEFT JOIN TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM CI ON T.CTRT_NO = CI.CTRT_NO AND T.ITEM_SYS_NO = CI.ITEM_SYS_NO LEFT JOIN TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT CIL ON T.CTRT_NO = CIL.CTRT_NO AND T.ITEM_SYS_NO = CIL.ITEM_SYS_NO AND T.LOT_ID = CIL.LOT_ID ORDER BY T.PO_SYS_NO ASC, T.ITEM_CD ASC, T.ITEM_SEQ ASC, T.RECEIVED_TYPE_CD DESC
sqlMap.update: /* WHPutaway.modifyWHPutawayInfo */ DECLARE @WH_CD VARCHAR(20) SET @WH_CD = dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE (#wh_cd#) UPDATE TL_WH_PUTAWAY SET SUPV_NM = #supv_nm# ,PUTAWAY_HM_FR = REPLACE (#putaway_hm_fr#, ':', '') ,PUTAWAY_HM_TO = REPLACE (#putaway_hm_to#, ':', '') ,WORK_NM = #work_nm# ,MSG_TO_WK = #msg_to_wk# ,MODI_ID = #user_id# ,MODI_OFC_CD = #org_cd# ,MODI_SYS_DT = GETDATE() ,MODI_LOC_DT = (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 0, 9)), 111) + ' ' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 1, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 3, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 5, 2)) WHERE WIB_IN_NO = #wib_in_no#
sqlMap.insert: /* WHPutaway.addWHPutawayInfo */ DECLARE @WH_CD VARCHAR(20) SET @WH_CD = dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE (#wh_cd#) INSERT INTO TL_WH_PUTAWAY ( WIB_IN_NO ,SUPV_NM ,PUTAWAY_HM_FR ,PUTAWAY_HM_TO ,WORK_NM ,MSG_TO_WK ,RGST_ID ,RGST_OFC_CD ,RGST_SYS_DT ,RGST_LOC_DT ,MODI_ID ,MODI_OFC_CD ,MODI_SYS_DT ,MODI_LOC_DT ) VALUES ( #wib_in_no# ,#supv_nm# ,REPLACE (#putaway_hm_fr#, ':', '') ,REPLACE (#putaway_hm_to#, ':', '') ,#work_nm# ,#msg_to_wk# ,#user_id# ,#org_cd# ,GETDATE() ,(SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 0, 9)), 111) + ' ' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 1, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 3, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 5, 2)) ,#user_id# ,#org_cd# ,GETDATE() ,(SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 0, 9)), 111) + ' ' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 1, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 3, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 5, 2)) )
sqlMap.update: /* WHPutaway.modifyClearWHPutawayInvChgFlg */ DECLARE @WH_CD VARCHAR(20) SET @WH_CD = dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE (#wh_cd#) UPDATE TL_WH_PUTAWAY_ITEM SET INV_CHG_FLG = NULL ,MODI_ID = #user_id# ,MODI_OFC_CD = #org_cd# ,MODI_SYS_DT = GETDATE() ,MODI_LOC_DT = (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 0, 9)), 111) + ' ' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 1, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 3, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 5, 2)) WHERE WIB_IN_NO = #wib_in_no#
sqlMap.insert: /* WHPutaway.addWHPutawayItemList */ DECLARE @WH_CD VARCHAR(20) SET @WH_CD = dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE (#wh_cd#) INSERT INTO TL_WH_PUTAWAY_ITEM ( WIB_IN_NO ,WIB_BK_NO ,PO_SYS_NO ,ITEM_SYS_NO ,ITEM_SEQ ,PUTAWAY_SEQ ,PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD ,PUTAWAY_PKGUNIT ,PUTAWAY_PKGQTY ,PUTAWAY_EA_QTY ,RCV_SND_DMG_CD ,INV_CHG_FLG ,PUTAWAY_CBM ,PUTAWAY_CBF ,PUTAWAY_GRS_KGS ,PUTAWAY_GRS_LBS ,PUTAWAY_NET_KGS ,PUTAWAY_NET_LBS ,RGST_ID ,RGST_OFC_CD ,RGST_SYS_DT ,RGST_LOC_DT ,MODI_ID ,MODI_OFC_CD ,MODI_SYS_DT ,MODI_LOC_DT ) VALUES ( #wib_in_no# ,#wib_bk_no# ,#po_sys_no# ,#item_sys_no# ,#item_seq# ,(SELECT ISNULL (MAX (PUTAWAY_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TL_WH_PUTAWAY_ITEM WHERE WIB_IN_NO = #wib_in_no# AND WIB_BK_NO = #wib_bk_no# AND PO_SYS_NO = #po_sys_no# AND ITEM_SYS_NO = #item_sys_no# AND ITEM_SEQ = #item_seq#) ,#putaway_wh_loc_cd# ,#putaway_pkgunit# ,#putaway_pkgqty# ,#putaway_ea_qty# ,#rcv_snd_dmg_cd# ,'Y' ,#putaway_cbm# ,#putaway_cbf# ,#putaway_grs_kgs# ,#putaway_grs_lbs# ,#putaway_net_kgs# ,#putaway_net_lbs# ,#user_id# ,#org_cd# ,GETDATE() ,(SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 0, 9)), 111) + ' ' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 1, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 3, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 5, 2)) ,#user_id# ,#org_cd# ,GETDATE() ,(SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 0, 9)), 111) + ' ' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 1, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 3, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 5, 2)) )
sqlMap.update:
/* WHPutaway.modifyWHPutawayItemList */ DECLARE @WH_CD VARCHAR(20) SET @WH_CD = dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE (#wh_cd#) UPDATE TL_WH_PUTAWAY_ITEM SET PUTAWAY_WH_LOC_CD = #putaway_wh_loc_cd# ,PUTAWAY_PKGUNIT = #putaway_pkgunit# ,PUTAWAY_PKGQTY = CONVERT(NUMERIC, #putaway_pkgqty#) ,PUTAWAY_EA_QTY = CONVERT(NUMERIC, #putaway_ea_qty#) ,RCV_SND_DMG_CD = #rcv_snd_dmg_cd# ,INV_CHG_FLG = #inv_chg_flg# ,PUTAWAY_CBM = CONVERT(NUMERIC, #putaway_cbm#) ,PUTAWAY_CBF = CONVERT(NUMERIC, #putaway_cbf#) ,PUTAWAY_GRS_KGS = CONVERT(NUMERIC, #putaway_grs_kgs#) ,PUTAWAY_GRS_LBS = CONVERT(NUMERIC, #putaway_grs_lbs#) ,PUTAWAY_NET_KGS = CONVERT(NUMERIC, #putaway_net_kgs#) ,PUTAWAY_NET_LBS = CONVERT(NUMERIC, #putaway_net_lbs#) ,MODI_ID = #user_id# ,MODI_OFC_CD = #org_cd# ,MODI_SYS_DT = GETDATE() ,MODI_LOC_DT = (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 0, 9)), 111) + ' ' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 1, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 3, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING((SELECT @WH_CD), 9, LEN((SELECT @WH_CD))), 5, 2)) WHERE WIB_IN_NO = #wib_in_no# AND WIB_BK_NO = #wib_bk_no# AND PO_SYS_NO = #po_sys_no# AND ITEM_SYS_NO = #item_sys_no# AND ITEM_SEQ = CONVERT (NUMERIC, #item_seq#)
AND PUTAWAY_SEQ = CONVERT (NUMERIC, #putaway_seq#)
sqlMap.delete: /* WHPutaway.removeWHPutawayItemList */ DELETE FROM TL_WH_PUTAWAY_ITEM WHERE WIB_IN_NO = #wib_in_no# AND WIB_BK_NO = #wib_bk_no# AND PO_SYS_NO = #po_sys_no# AND ITEM_SYS_NO = #item_sys_no# AND ITEM_SEQ = #item_seq# AND PUTAWAY_SEQ = #putaway_seq#
